response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe its value extends far beyond its tangible components, making it worth more than $15,000 to us. We're offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to benefit from our product's unique features and unparalleled quality. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 18000}
